name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN : The Beach Demo
detailed_description:
About This Game

The Welcome To... Chichester series is set in a semi-fictional world where secret organisations covertly battle each other for ideological supremacy.

The Story

Sometime during your holiday in England, yourself and your friends receive an invite to "The Beach". Thinking the invite is for a private beach party, they are sorely disappointed when they end up at a haunted bungalow and tasked with finding three parts of a sword.

Will everyone survive ? Or will everyone succumb to the haunted chairs, lack of food and water - or perhaps even the perverted ghosts ?

This demo runs up until the end of the first chapter.

short_description: Sometime during your holiday in England, yourself and your friends receive an invite to "The Beach". Thinking the invite is for a private beach party, they are sorely disappointed when they end up at a haunted bungalow and tasked with finding three parts of a sword. Will everyone survive ?

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester OVN : The Beach

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any windows compatible sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card

legal_notice:
Music by Sascha Ende, Sascha Schulz
Licence: CC BY +
Title tune : "Friends Dont Let Friends Drive Everyone Crazy" by BobBirthisel. Licensed from Pond5
Background graphics by Raka and Mustikadewia
Characters by Larvinlucas
